I created this webpage including the Quarto blog during my training [Websites and Dashboards with R](https://thegraphcourses.org/courses/websites-and-dashboards-with-r/), provided by the [GRAPH network](https://thegraphcourses.org/). I highly recommend the course, every minute in it is worth your time!

I'll post in this blog my favorite Quarto tutorials and how-to guides. Most of the content will not be written by me, it is rather a summary of useful input by other very knowledgeable and dedicated people.

Welcome and many thanks to all the people publishing such helpful tutorials!
